name: Minimal 404 Page Templates
description:
404 page is not about having fun, its about trouble your user faced and methods you can help him to solve it or minimize negative experience.


Mostly i see 404 pages with funny images and this is why i decided to create this minimal pack and hope it help your users to find what they need from 404 page on your website.


Ps. You are still can use images but its not enough when you focus on helping your users reach their goals using your website.


This survey can help you find 404 template which fits your project the best.
